| History                 = Howard T. Duck Private Investigations  is a detective agency run by [[Howard the Duck (Earth-791021)|Howard the Duck]] in [[Cleveland]], [[Ohio (State)|Ohio]]. 

===New York City===
Howard returned to his business as a private eye, working in the same building as [[Jennifer Walters (Earth-616)|She-Hulk]], in [[Brooklyn]]. One of his first new clients was Jonathan Richards, who hired Howard to retrieve a necklace stolen by the [[Felicia Hardy (Earth-616)|Black Cat]]. With the help of [[Tara Tam (Earth-616)|Tara Tam]], a new ally, Howard managed to recover the necklace, but in his way to give it back to Richards he found himself kidnapped by the [[Taneleer Tivan (Earth-616)|Collector]],{{r|Howard the Duck Vol 5 1}} allied with the [[Guardians of the Galaxy (Earth-616)|Guardians of the Galaxy]] to escape the villain's collection,{{r|Howard the Duck Vol 5 2}} and confronting the Ringmaster, who had been hypnotizing old people into robbing for him.

After recovering the necklace for a third time, Howard was approached by Richards in the middle of his fight against the Ringmaster, and Richards revealed himself to be [[Talos (Earth-616)|Talos]] the Untamed.{{r|Howard the Duck Vol 5 3}}
